channel.title: Question about forums, how do you put a download link, images on your post
channel.description:
how do you put a download link on your post? I'v seen people with links at the bottom of their post, it looks like a paperclip, as if its an attachment to an e-mail.
how do you put a image on you post? if you press the icon "insert image" on the add post page, you just get (img)(img) what are you suppost to put in between the two words?
on the add post page, there is a icon called "insert FTP Link" what does it do?
Please note: I'm not a total noob, i do know a lot about SCAR scripting

item.title: Question about forums, how do you put a download link, images on your post
item.dc:creator: @Sepranem Sepranem
item.description:
@Sepranem wrote:

yeah imageshack is good…i’m just used to photobucket

Read full topic

item.title: Question about forums, how do you put a download link, images on your post
item.dc:creator: @Sepranem Sepranem
item.description:
@Sepranem wrote:

yeah, i was under the impression he was talking about a pic on his comp that isnt already on the internet…such as a screenie or something like that

Read full topic
item.source: Question about forums, how do you put a download link, images on your post

item.title: Question about forums, how do you put a download link, images on your post
item.dc:creator: @cawagula cawagula
item.description:
@cawagula wrote:

No, you just get the direct link and use imagetags. say the url was www.moparisthebest.com/picture.gif then you would paste the following code in:

[img]www.moparisthebest.com/picture.gif[/img]

Read full topic
item.source: Question about forums, how do you put a download link, images on your post

item.title: Question about forums, how do you put a download link, images on your post
item.dc:creator: @Sepranem Sepranem
item.description:
@Sepranem wrote:

and for the image, you need to upload the image to a host, i use photobucket…then get the url for it.

example: [-IMG]http://(put the url here)[/img-] (take out the hyphens next to IMG)

thats if its your picture, like a screenie or something that isnt on the internet, if its a pic from a site, then just put the link between the IMG’s

Read full topic

item.title: Question about forums, how do you put a download link, images on your post
item.dc:creator: @cawagula cawagula
item.description:
@cawagula wrote:

LMAO, that has nothing to do with scar.

The paperclip is an attachment. To make one click the “Additional Options…” and then browse next to the attach box and select what you want to attach.

Read full topic
